original_title: Zombie Jamboree: The Day the Dead..uh..Weren't
overview: The Cottontail forest is overrun by legions of the undead. Soldiers and some friends go in to stop the threat. Who will make it out alive?
tagline: 7 years have passed... debts will be forgiven... slaves will be freedâ€¦ and people will die.
